channel.title: Soulsplit Help
channel.description:
So i added in soulsplit, and at first it was set that every time i hit it would always be healed a two. I fixed that by putting[code]int heal = (int) (damage / 5)[/code]
Now when I go to compile it says there is an error that the symbol damage cannot be found.

item.title: Soulsplit Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Master Flips, post:3, topic:524353”][quote author=Lordabyssal link=topic=642894.msg4329006#msg4329006 date=1373397056]
Make sure damage can be read in that method. For example int damage = 0;
[/quote]

Where would i put that, right under the new code? Sorry im a beginner at this[/quote]
It’d be nice to know what you changed. not just what you put in.
Also, can I/we see where this is in your files? (Meaning post the method…)

Read full topic

Where would i put that, right under the new code? Sorry im a beginner at this
